ai-thi-ap24:1.3_0: It is a hundred thousand people making a thousand sacrifices
ai-thi-ap24:1.4_0: for a eon would be expanded.
ai-thi-ap24:2.1_0: for the benefit of all beings:
ai-thi-ap24:2.4_0: the one on the path of congregation.
ai-thi-ap24:3.2_0: shining in what is their color,
ai-thi-ap24:3.3_0: is venerated by the whole world.
ai-thi-ap24:4.1_0: We have gone beyond doubt, got rid of indecision.
ai-thi-ap24:5.4_0: But a fool lies (only) with joined palms,
ai-thi-ap24:6.1_0: the one who knows the path,
ai-thi-ap24:6.3_0: He is skilled in the variety of paths,
ai-thi-ap24:7.1_0: He is a Teacher of great compassion,
ai-thi-ap24:8.3_0: Well-Behikkhus, even though they were very beautiful,
ai-thi-ap24:10.3_0: The great hero, having gone to the Avīci hell,
ai-thi-ap24:11.1_0: for he is the one who involves the world.
ai-thi-ap24:11.3_0: in the midst of the assembly,
ai-thi-ap24:11.4_0: she placed it in the foremost position.
ai-thi-ap24:12.1_0: Having heard that, the Lord of the World grew up,
ai-thi-ap24:12.2_0: Having given a gift to the Teacher,
ai-thi-ap24:12.4_0: I got rid of my clairvoyance.
ai-thi-ap24:13.1_0: Then the teacher said this to me:
ai-thi-ap24:13.3_0: I’m the one who worships the Dhamma,
ai-thi-ap24:14.2_0: But born into a family of family.
ai-thi-ap24:14.3_0: Gotama is the name of Gotama.
ai-thi-ap24:15.1_0: are my heirs in the things,
ai-thi-ap24:16.4_0: I went to the company of the Thirty-Three.
ai-thi-ap24:18.1_0: I was a wanderer called a female wanderer.
ai-thi-ap24:18.2_0: I then used to live alone
ai-thi-ap24:19.1_0: Having lighted a lamp with that,
ai-thi-ap24:20.4_0: I went to the company of the Thirty-Three.
ai-thi-ap24:21.4_0: My supports have been set up,
ai-thi-ap24:22.2_0: even the mountains of a mountain
ai-thi-ap24:22.4_0: as the fruit of giving a gift of light.
ai-thi-ap24:23.2_0: I’m the one who worships fame,
ai-thi-ap24:23.4_0: as the fruit of giving a gift of light.
ai-thi-ap24:24.2_0: I was reborn in a rich family,
ai-thi-ap24:25.1_0: but I have completed them all.
ai-thi-ap24:26.1_0: Having seen (that), the glory of famous ones,
ai-thi-ap24:26.2_0: gods and humans we (all) revere him,
ai-thi-ap24:28.2_0: by means of the divine ear-element.
ai-thi-ap24:28.3_0: I know what belongs to others.
ai-thi-ap24:28.4_0: and I do the Teacher’s bidding,
ai-thi-ap24:29.3_0: Having thrown it away, all the defilements,
ai-thi-ap24:30.3_0: The heavy burden is laid down,
ai-thi-ap24:30.4_0: the attachment to rebirth is eradicated.
ai-thi-ap24:31.1_0: I’ve gone forth in regard to fame
ai-thi-ap24:32.3_0: it shows why the divine eyes
ai-thi-ap24:34.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-thi-ap24:36.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the nun Sakulā.
